questions.question: Who was recently elected as the new president of the European Council of the European Union?
questions.solution: Charles Michel was re-elected as the President of the European Council in March 2022.

questions.question: Consider the following statements about Exercise Khan Quest, held between 27 July and 9 August 2024:
questions.solution: Both statements are correct about Exercise Khan Quest.

questions.question: Which country recently became the world's first country to prepare a complete checklist of its entire fauna?
questions.solution: India recently became the world's first country to prepare a complete checklist of its entire fauna.

questions.question: In which year was Nalanda University included in the World Heritage Site?
questions.solution: Nalanda University was included in the World Heritage Site in 2016.

questions.question: What is 'K2-18B' recently in the news?
questions.solution: K2-18B is an exoplanet that has the potential to support life.

questions.question: What is 'Aedes albopictus' recently in the news?
questions.solution: Aedes albopictus is a mosquito species that is a major vector for dengue and Zika viruses.

questions.question: In which state is the Ghodbandar Fort located?
questions.solution: Ghodbandar Fort is located in Maharashtra.

questions.question: In which country is the Ruang volcano located, which is recently in the news due to its eruption?
questions.solution: The Ruang volcano is located in Indonesia.

questions.question: Recently, Halldora Tomasdottir was elected president of which country?
questions.solution: Halldora Tomasdottir was recently elected president of Iceland.

questions.question: Who recently received the Hindi Sahitya Bharati Award 2024?
questions.solution: Smita Vishwakarma recently received the Hindi Sahitya Bharati Award 2024.

questions.question: In which state is the Ujani dam located, which was recently in the news?
questions.solution: The Ujani dam is located in Maharashtra.

questions.question: Which country did India send the sacred Sarayu river water for the Abhishek ceremony of the Sita Amma temple dedicated to Goddess Sita?
questions.solution: India sent the sacred Sarayu river water for the Abhishek ceremony of the Sita Amma temple dedicated to Goddess Sita in Nepal.

questions.question: Pema Khandu recently became the Chief Minister of which northeastern state?
questions.solution: Pema Khandu recently became the Chief Minister of Arunachal Pradesh.

questions.question: Recently, ISRO decided to achieve debris-free space by which year?
questions.solution: ISRO decided to achieve debris-free space by 2035.

questions.question: Recently, where did 'Japan India Maritime Exercise 2024 (JIMEX-24)' begin?
questions.solution: The 'Japan India Maritime Exercise 2024 (JIMEX-24)' began in Yokosuka, Japan.

questions.question: Recently, 'Kathiya wheat' has been given a Geographical Indication (GI) tag, which state is it related to?
questions.solution: Kathiya wheat is related to Gujarat.

questions.question: Who is the current president of the World Bank?
questions.solution: Ajay Banga is the current president of the World Bank.

questions.question: Archaeologists of Kerala University recently discovered a 5200-year-old Harappan-era settled area in which place?
questions.solution: Archaeologists of Kerala University recently discovered a 5200-year-old Harappan-era settled area in Rakhigarhi, Haryana.

questions.question: Where was the inauguration of India's first green hydrogen plant in the stainless steel sector done?
questions.solution: The inauguration of India's first green hydrogen plant in the stainless steel sector was done in Pune, Maharashtra.

questions.question: Who was not honored with the 58th Jnanpith Award of the year 2023?
questions.solution: Only statement 3 is correct. The 58th Jnanpith Award of the year 2023 was not awarded to any writer.

questions.question: When was the 44th 'Homecoming Day' celebrated in which country?
questions.solution: The 44th 'Homecoming Day' was celebrated in Bangladesh.

questions.question: In which country is 'Matatirtha Aunsi' or Mother's Day celebrated?
questions.solution: Matatirtha Aunsi or Mother's Day is celebrated in Nepal.

questions.question: Between which countries was the joint military exercise 'Maitri' organized?
questions.solution: The joint military exercise 'Maitri' was organized between India and Nepal.

questions.question: Which actor was awarded the 'Lata Dinanath Mangeshkar Award 2024'?
questions.solution: Ajay Devgn was awarded the 'Lata Dinanath Mangeshkar Award 2024'.

questions.question: In which country was the Rabanda bill passed?
questions.solution: The Rabanda bill was passed in Nepal.

questions.question: In which country is the 'Ashdod Port' located, which was recently in the news?
questions.solution: The 'Ashdod Port' is located in Israel.

questions.question: In which state was the 'Paramveer Chakra Park' inaugurated?
questions.solution: The 'Paramveer Chakra Park' was inaugurated in Kerala.

questions.question: In which state are the Churchill Bhojshala and Kamal Maula Masjid located?
questions.solution: The Churchill Bhojshala and Kamal Maula Masjid are located in Madhya Pradesh.

questions.question: Which state has launched the 'Widow Remarriage Incentive Scheme'?
questions.solution: Bihar has launched the 'Widow Remarriage Incentive Scheme'.

questions.question: Between which countries was the maritime exercise 'Samudra Lakshman' organized?
questions.solution: The maritime exercise 'Samudra Lakshman' was organized between India and Malaysia.
